profilePageGUI

Class ChangeProfileDetailsGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • logging.LoggingGUI
      • profilePageGUI.ProfilePage
        • profilePageGUI.ChangeProfileDetailsGUI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChangePassword, ChangeSecurity, ChangeUsername

    public class ChangeProfileDetailsGUI
extends ProfilePage
    The class deals with the entire graphical user interface related to changing profile details here a player is given an option via a comboBox to which details of their account they wish the change.

    • Method Detail

      • changeProfileDetailsPage

        public static javax.swing.JPanel changeProfileDetailsPage()
        This method creates a JPanel for the Change Profile Details page. Here a player gets the choice to move to the designated page to change his/her selected information.
        Returns:
        the JPanel for the change username page

      • implementSelection

        public static void implementSelection(java.lang.String comboBoxChoice)
        This method handles the selection of the comboBox, depending pn the choice made the player will be moved to the appropriate page
        Parameters:
        comboBoxChoice - a string representing the player's choice
